channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: A line of tornadoes leaves a path of destruction in Alabama and Georgia; a violent microburst unleashes its fury in Thailand; in Turkey, an unexpected downpour turns streets into rivers.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: An unstoppable wave of mud and water destroys several mining towns in Peru; Missouri residents wake up to a deluge when record-breaking rainfall brings severe flooding; in Inner Mongolia, a hillside unexpectedly collapses.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: Extreme flooding in Nebraska destroys a 100-year-old dam; firefighters are thrown into the raging currents of the Elkhorn River; when a cruise ship slams into a winter storm, a wave crashes into the ship, sweeping a woman away from her husband.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: Amid raging floodwaters in West Virginia, a father and son try to save a woman from drowning; in Dayton, Ohio, a very young storm chaser alerts the community to a tornado that the experts didn't see coming.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: Police body cam footage captures the rescue of a mother and her four young children from Tropical Storm Imelda near Houston; a mother in a small town near Little Rock, Ark., tries in vain to save all nine of her children from an EF4 twister.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: A single mother and her two sons get sucked into the vortex of a tornado and survive; a family from Mississippi learns that survival sometimes means needing help; preparation for a disaster means endurance for a community in Texas.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: Mother risks her life to save her two children as her house is torn to pieces; family risks their lives to save their neighbors; mother and daughter learn the meaning of survival.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: Strangers unite to survive a tornado; storm chasers rescue a family; friends become first responders to help a trapped family in their own home; injured toddler is saved by a police officer.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.title: Pattrn

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: Dave and his daughter Alyssa struggle to recover a vintage ore cart from an abandoned copper mine; Angela struggles on what should be an easy job, and Dale goes on an epic hunt for furnace oil for Donny's shop.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: After Angela accepts a job from Dave, Big Donny lures her away with a better offer; Dave tries to get back at him by buying a truck Donny wanted just so he can flip it to him for a profit; an overworked Junior convinces Craig to go for a joyride.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: Gary's team fights to upright a battered trailer; a rookie takes his first shot as lead operator on the rotator.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: Kyle tangles with a wreck that will prove if he's got what it takes to lead the team; Sonny heads to the scene of a violent jackknife.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: A whiteout pile-up scatters heavy I-beams across the highway, testing James and his crew; Kevin must lift a 20,000-pound chunk of steel off the road.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: During a spring storm, Steve cleans up a fuel spill blocking the 400, while Sonny struggles to keep the alternate route moving; John Allen recovers a loaded semi that went for a wild airborne ride.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Mack brings his old man on a trip; Greg hauls all of his traps to prep for spring; Gail makes her biggest sale of the season.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Captain Greg Turner races a winter storm to save his stranded son, while Mack Kelley navigates unpredictable weather to keep family traditions alive.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Gail's hot streak comes with a target on her back; Greg faces the risks of hauling at night and Lex's issues stack up.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: A winter pile-up explodes into chaos; ferocious flood waters take a driver on a terrifying ride of lifetime; airboats come to the rescue during Hurricane Florence; friends must save a skier buried alive.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: A survivor becomes a hero after a deadly tornado smashes through his town; storm chasers are battered from above; monster waves toss surfers into turmoil; a raging river traps a boy on a waterfall.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: A tornado outbreak erupts over central Iowa on July 19, 2018; after an EF3 tornado makes a direct hit on a heavy equipment plant filled with hundreds of workers and guests, another EF3 twister tears directly down Marshalltown's main street.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Unseasonably warm weather in Canada triggers six tornadoes in a matter of hours; an EF3 beast tears through a strip mall terrorizing a teenager and his mother who is impaled by flying glass; another tornado cuts a path of destruction through Ottawa.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Memorial Day weekend 2018, almost 10 inches of rain in two hours sends a monster wave of water through downtown Ellicott City, Md.; it traps tourists and business owners, sweeps vehicles away and collapses buildings.

channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Charlie rescues a family trapped in a live lane of traffic; the Stauffer's Utah crew battles to upright a rollover pinned between moving traffic and open water; a sinkhole swallows a 200,000-pound excavator.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Two separate crashes in Utah spur the Stauffer's crew to perform a pair of dramatic recoveries; Bad Grandpa goes for a plunge when the Mountain Recovery team attempts a daring job on a raging river.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Intense winds and icy roads send a semi to the edge of a sheer drop; heavy snowfall forces Charlie out of his comfort zone and into a much bigger truck than normal; Bad Grandpa schools the boss in the art of recovery.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: When winds blow a bus off of I-80, Art must wrestle it back; a load of produce rolls off, tearing down a fence that's keeping a herd of elk from the highway; Jesse races to finish a tough recovery in time to be part of an important family milestone.

channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

channel.title: Highway Thru Hell

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: A flash freeze launches Team Green into action; Dylan heads a two-wrecker recovery of a toppled lumber truck; Jason tackles a two-piece gravel wreck; a snowy recovery deals Jamie an unexpected snag; Reliable's Ty and Chris search for a wreck.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: Aggressive Towing mobilizes both rotators to help MSA on back-to-back recoveries; two young Reliable Mission up-and-comers are hours from civilization when a backroad recovery goes into night; Greg is helped by Jamie on a jackknife in winter.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: Jamie and the next generation take on an airbag wreck similar to a challenging one from the past; Dylan must rely on roadside ingenuity against a sideways semi; Al and Gord deal with four wheelers on the Coq.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadman's Curse
channel.desc: Taylor unearths new testimony from a witness to Slumach's execution; a deathbed letter written by a man who claims to have found Slumach's gold sends Adam and Kru on a dangerous glacial trek in search of the fabled mother lode.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadman's Curse
channel.desc: The recent glacier expedition leaves Kru rattled and rethinking his approach; clues left by an Indigenous voice from the past send the entire team north into the wild terrain of the Upper Pitt in search of Slumach's gold.
